content.question: Which of the following samples contains the greatest percentage of carbon by mass?

choices.label: The figure shows a particle diagram. The diagram consists of three molecules. Two molecules are comprised of a single C atom connected to four H atoms, and one molecule is comprised of two connected C atoms, each of which is connected to three H atoms.

The figure shows a particle diagram. The diagram consists of two molecules. One molecule is comprised of a single C atom connected to four H atoms, and one molecule is comprised of three connected C atoms in a row. The outer two C atoms each have two H atoms connected to them.

The figure shows a particle diagram. The diagram consists of four molecules. Two molecules are comprised of a single C atom connected to a single O atom, and two molecules are comprised of a single C atom, each of which is connected to two O atoms.
The figure shows a particle diagram. The diagram consists of two molecules and four atoms. The two molecules are comprised of two connected O atoms, and the four atoms are all singular C atoms.

content.answer: The figure shows a particle diagram. The diagram consists of two molecules. One molecule is comprised of a single C atom connected to four H atoms, and one molecule is comprised of three connected C atoms in a row. The outer two C atoms each have two H atoms connected to them.

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
